caption.title: Effect of control interventions on cluster size.
caption.p: a) Cluster size over time. Solid lines: average; shaded area: 95% credible interval. b) Violin plots of the distribution of the average cluster size with and without control; the distributions are computed from 100 averages over 1,000 clusters randomly sampled from the 20,000 simulated clusters. Squares represent the average values.
